sentences.en: a backhand stroke
sentences.cn: 一记反手击球

sentences.en: a stroke patient
sentences.cn: 中风患者

sentences.en: At the first stroke it will be 9 o'clock exactly.
sentences.cn: 等到钟敲第一下时就是9点整。

sentences.en: At the time, his appointment seemed a stroke of genius.
sentences.cn: 当时，对他的任命犹如神来之笔。

sentences.en: attitudes cannot be changed at one stroke.
sentences.cn: 态度不可能一下子改变。

sentences.en: Church bells pealed at the stroke of midnight.
sentences.cn: 教堂大钟在午夜敲响。

sentences.en: Compton was sending the ball here, there, and everywhere with each stroke.
sentences.cn: 康普顿一会将球打到这里，一会打到那里，每一拍的落点都不同。

sentences.en: he arrived on the stroke of two.
sentences.cn: 他两点准时到达。

sentences.en: He broke the lock with one stroke of the hammer.
sentences.cn: 他一锤就把锁砸坏了.

sentences.en: He cried out at each stroke of the whip.
sentences.cn: 鞭子每抽一下，他就大叫一声。

sentences.en: He drove in a nail with one stroke of the hammer.
sentences.cn: 他一锤就把钉子敲进去了.

sentences.en: He had a minor stroke in 1987, which left him partly paralysed.
sentences.cn: 他1987年曾患轻度中风，之后就半身不遂了。

sentences.en: He reached out and stroked her cheek tenderly.
sentences.cn: 他伸出手，温柔地抚摸她的脸颊。

sentences.en: He was putting the finishing stroke to the portrait.
sentences.cn: 他给这幅画作最后的修饰.

sentences.en: His punishment was six strokes of the cane.
sentences.cn: 给他的惩罚是挨六教鞭。

sentences.en: How can Britain reduce its prison population in one stroke?
sentences.cn: 英国如何能一下子减少其监狱服刑人数？

sentences.en: I never did a stroke of work at college.
sentences.cn: 我在上大学时懒得要命。

sentences.en: It didn't rain, which turned out to be a stroke of luck.
sentences.cn: 天没下雨，结果成了件幸事。

sentences.en: Obesity correlates with increased risk for hypertension and stroke.
sentences.cn: 肥胖会增加高血压和中风发作的几率。

sentences.en: On the stroke of 12, fireworks suddenly exploded into the night.
sentences.cn: 12点的钟声刚敲响，焰火便在夜空中绽放。

sentences.en: She died following a massive stroke.
sentences.cn: 她重度中风后去世了。

sentences.en: She had a stroke and was unable to walk again.
sentences.cn: 她中风后再也不能走路了.

sentences.en: The disease wiped out 40 million rabbits at a stroke.
sentences.cn: 该疾病一下子就使4,000万只兔子丧命。

sentences.en: What a beautiful stroke!
sentences.cn: 击球动作多漂亮呀！

words.tran_cn: 击，打；（用笔等）画；划掉（stroke的ing形式）
中风；冲程；笔画；打击；尝试；轻抚
击球；作尾桨手；敲击键盘

phrases.tran_cn: 笔触，绘画的技巧；画笔描边

phrases.phrase: not (或 never) do a stroke of work
phrases.tran_cn: 什么也不干，根本不工作
短行程，短气体活塞行程；短时雷击
行程控制；冲程调节，行程调节
有利可图的交易，赚钱的交易

trans.tran_cn: 中风，(铅笔等的)笔画，划水动作，游法，钟声，击球，一件(幸运的)事，(灵感)突发
trans.tran_en: if someone has a stroke, an  artery (= tube carrying blood )  in their brain suddenly bursts or becomes blocked, so that they may die or be unable to use some muscles
to move your hand gently over something
to move your hand gently over something
